data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 (1803); MS Edge 42.17134.1.0 - EdgeHTML 17.17134
data.short_description: White messages on the pinned modal appear black
data.steps_to_repro: - Log onto Canary Discord on Edge - Go to a channel - Click on the pinned modal - If there are no pinned messages, observe the text - If there are pinned messages, observe the Jump button's text
